author: Dr15Jones
body: Modified how HCAL conditions containers are used in order to be thread safe. The `setTopo` method of the containers is now non-const. Therefore to fully initialize a container read from the database, the container is copied and the copy gets the `setTopo` call. This copy is either done via an ESProducer or, for less used containers, by the module which requested the original container.
title: Thread safe access to HCAL conditions containers
